import './BrowseInternships.css';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {

          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>

          <input

            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">

                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}
                </div>
                <button className="apply-btn" onClick={() => navigate(`/student/applications`)}>
                  Apply Now
                </button>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="empty-state">
            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './BrowseInternships.css';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {
    setSaved(s => s.includes(id) ? s.filter(x => x !== id) : [...s, id]);
  };

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="browse-page">
        <div className="page-header">
          <h1>Browse Internships</h1>
          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>
        </div>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">
                <div className="job-header">
                  <div>
                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}
                </div>
                <button className="apply-btn" onClick={() => navigate(`/student/applications`)}>
                  Apply Now
                </button>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="empty-state">
            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );

import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './BrowseInternships.css';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {
    setSaved(s => s.includes(id) ? s.filter(x => x !== id) : [...s, id]);
  };

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="browse-page">
        <div className="page-header">
          <h1>Browse Internships</h1>
          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>
        </div>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">
                <div className="job-header">
                  <div>
                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}
                </div>
                <button className="apply-btn" onClick={() => navigate(`/student/applications`)}>
                  Apply Now
                </button>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="empty-state">
            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

```jsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

    if (userRole === 'student') {
      return [
        { path: '/student/dashboard', icon: 'ğŸ“Š', label: 'Dashboard' },
        { path: '/student/browse', icon: 'ğŸ”', label: 'Browse Internships' },
        { path: '/student/applications', icon: 'ğŸ“‹', label: 'My Applications' },
        { path: '/student/resume', icon: 'ğŸ“„', label: 'My Resume' },
        { path: '/student/profile', icon: 'ğŸ‘¤', label: 'Profile' },
      ];
    } else if (userRole === 'recruiter') {
      return [
        { path: '/recruiter/dashboard', icon: 'ğŸ“Š', label: 'Dashboard' },

        { path: '/admin/reports', icon: 'ğŸ“ˆ', label: 'Reports' },
      ];
    }
    return [];
  };

  const navItems = getNavItems();
  const initials = user?.name

            <button
              key={item.path}
              className={`nav-item ${location.pathname === item.path ? 'active' : ''}`}

              title={item.label}
            >
              <span className="nav-icon">{item.icon}</span>
              {sidebarOpen && <span className="nav-label">{item.label}</span>}
            </button>
          ))}
        </nav>

        <div className="sidebar-footer">
          <div className="user-profile">
            <div className="user-avatar">{initials}</div>
            {sidebarOpen && (
              <div className="user-info">
                <div>{user?.name || 'User'}</div>

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './BrowseInternships.css';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {
    setSaved(s => s.includes(id) ? s.filter(x => x !== id) : [...s, id]);
  };

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="browse-page">
        <div className="page-header">
          <h1>Browse Internships</h1>
          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>
        </div>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">
                <div className="job-header">
                  <div>
                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}
                </div>
                <button className="apply-btn" onClick={() => navigate(`/student/applications`)}>
                  Apply Now
                </button>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="empty-state">
            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

import React, { useState } from 'react';

import './BrowseInternships.css';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {
    setSaved(s => s.includes(id) ? s.filter(x => x !== id) : [...s, id]);
  };

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="browse-page">

          <h1>Browse Internships</h1>
          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">
                <div className="job-header">

                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}
                </div>
                <button className="apply-btn" onClick={() => navigate(`/student/applications`)}>

          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="empty-state">
            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;

              </button>
            </div>
          )}
        </section>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default DashboardPage;

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  return (

            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (

                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;

import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },

  const filtered = internships.filter(

                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>

                <div className="skills">

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

import React, { useState } from 'react';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {

  };

  return (

          <h1>Browse Internships</h1>
          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">

                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}

        )}

  );
};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

            </div>
            <div className="stat-icon green">âœ…</div>
          </div>
          <div className="stat-card">

              <div className="stat-label">Pending Review</div>

            </div>
            <div className="stat-icon orange">â³</div>
          </div>
        </div>

          <button
            className="primary-btn"

          >

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {

  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||

          />

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">

                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>

                <div className="skills">

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;

    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;

        { path: '/recruiter/dashboard', icon: 'ğŸ“Š', label: 'Dashboard' },

      ];
    } else if (userRole === 'admin') {

        <div className="sidebar-footer">

          </div>
          <button className="logout-btn" onClick={handleLogout} title="Logout">

          </button>
        </div>
      </aside>

      {/* Main Content */}
      <main className="main-content">

        <div className="top-bar">

        {/* Content Area */}

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './BrowseInternships.css';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {
    setSaved(s => s.includes(id) ? s.filter(x => x !== id) : [...s, id]);
  };

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="browse-page">
        <div className="page-header">
          <h1>Browse Internships</h1>
          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>
        </div>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">
                <div className="job-header">
                  <div>
                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}
                </div>
                <button className="apply-btn" onClick={() => navigate(`/student/applications`)}>
                  Apply Now
                </button>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="empty-state">
            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

            <button className="profile-btn">{initials}</button>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Content Area */}
        <div className="content-wrapper">{children}</div>
      </main>

      {/* Mobile Overlay */}
      {sidebarOpen && (
        <div
          className="sidebar-overlay"
          onClick={() => setSidebarOpen(false)}
        />
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default DashboardLayout;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './BrowseInternships.css';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {
    setSaved(s => s.includes(id) ? s.filter(x => x !== id) : [...s, id]);
  };

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="browse-page">
        <div className="page-header">
          <h1>Browse Internships</h1>
          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>
        </div>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">
                <div className="job-header">
                  <div>
                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}
                </div>
                <button className="apply-btn" onClick={() => navigate(`/student/applications`)}>
                  Apply Now
                </button>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="empty-state">
            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './BrowseInternships.css';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {
    setSaved(s => s.includes(id) ? s.filter(x => x !== id) : [...s, id]);
  };

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="browse-page">
        <div className="page-header">
          <h1>Browse Internships</h1>
          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>
        </div>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">
                <div className="job-header">
                  <div>
                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}
                </div>
                <button className="apply-btn" onClick={() => navigate(`/student/applications`)}>
                  Apply Now
                </button>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="empty-state">
            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (

import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './BrowseInternships.css';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {
    setSaved(s => s.includes(id) ? s.filter(x => x !== id) : [...s, id]);
  };

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="browse-page">
        <div className="page-header">
          <h1>Browse Internships</h1>
          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>
        </div>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">
                <div className="job-header">
                  <div>
                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}
                </div>
                <button className="apply-btn" onClick={() => navigate(`/student/applications`)}>
                  Apply Now
                </button>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="empty-state">
            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

  const getNavItems = () => {
    if (userRole === 'student') {
      return [
        { path: '/student/dashboard', icon: 'ğŸ“Š', label: 'Dashboard' },
        { path: '/student/browse', icon: 'ğŸ”', label: 'Browse Internships' },
        { path: '/student/applications', icon: 'ğŸ“‹', label: 'My Applications' },
        { path: '/student/resume', icon: 'ğŸ“„', label: 'My Resume' },
        { path: '/student/profile', icon: 'ğŸ‘¤', label: 'Profile' },
      ];
    } else if (userRole === 'recruiter') {
      return [
        { path: '/recruiter/dashboard', icon: 'ğŸ“Š', label: 'Dashboard' },
        { path: '/recruiter/post', icon: 'â•', label: 'Post Internship' },

    } else if (userRole === 'admin') {

        { path: '/admin/reports', icon: 'ğŸ“ˆ', label: 'Reports' },
      ];

    return [];

  const navItems = getNavItems();
  const initials = user?.name

        <nav className="sidebar-nav">

            <button
              key={item.path}
              className={`nav-item ${location.pathname === item.path ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => navigate(item.path)}
              title={item.label}
            >
              <span className="nav-icon">{item.icon}</span>
              {sidebarOpen && <span className="nav-label">{item.label}</span>}
            </button>
          ))}
        </nav>

        <div className="sidebar-footer">
          <div className="user-profile">
            <div className="user-avatar">{initials}</div>
            {sidebarOpen && (
              <div className="user-info">
