import './BrowseInternships.css';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {
    setSaved(s => s.includes(id) ? s.filter(x => x !== id) : [...s, id]);
  };

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">

          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">

                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}

            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>

  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {

  };

  return (

          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">

                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}

                <button className="apply-btn" onClick={() => navigate(`/student/applications`)}>

          <div className="empty-state">
            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

};

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {

  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">

                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

          )}

          {activeTab === 'skills' && (

          {activeTab === 'settings' && (

            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}

            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (

                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

  ]);

  return (

              <div className="stat-value">{stats.totalApplications}</div>
            </div>
            <div className="stat-icon blue">ğŸ“‹</div>
          </div>
          <div className="stat-card">
            <div className="stat-info">
              <div className="stat-label">Shortlisted</div>
              <div className="stat-value">{stats.shortlisted}</div>
            </div>
            <div className="stat-icon green">âœ…</div>
          </div>
          <div className="stat-card">
            <div className="stat-info">
              <div className="stat-label">Pending Review</div>
              <div className="stat-value">{stats.pendingReview}</div>
            </div>
            <div className="stat-icon orange">â³</div>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Action Buttons */}
        <div className="action-buttons">
          <button
            className="primary-btn"
            onClick={() => navigate('/student/browse')}
          >
            ğŸ” Browse Internships
          </button>
          <button
            className="secondary-btn"
            onClick={() => navigate('/student/applications')}
          >
            ğŸ“‹ View All Applications

        </div>

        {/* Recent Applications */}
        <section className="section">

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

### **13. `src/services/api.js`**

```js
import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use(
  (response) => response,
  (error) => {
    if (error.response?.status === 401) {
      localStorage.removeItem('authToken');
      localStorage.removeItem('user');
      window.location.href = '/login';
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

export default api;
```

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())

            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">

                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

### **13. `src/services/api.js`**

```js
import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use(
  (response) => response,
  (error) => {
    if (error.response?.status === 401) {
      localStorage.removeItem('authToken');
      localStorage.removeItem('user');
      window.location.href = '/login';
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

export default api;
```

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}

            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (

                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

### **13. `src/services/api.js`**

```js
import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use(
  (response) => response,
  (error) => {
    if (error.response?.status === 401) {
      localStorage.removeItem('authToken');
      localStorage.removeItem('user');
      window.location.href = '/login';
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

export default api;
```

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './BrowseInternships.css';

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  const toggleSave = (id) => {
    setSaved(s => s.includes(id) ? s.filter(x => x !== id) : [...s, id]);
  };

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="browse-page">
        <div className="page-header">
          <h1>Browse Internships</h1>
          <p>Find your perfect internship opportunity</p>
        </div>

        <div className="browse-controls">
          <input
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search by company or role..."
            value={searchTerm}
            onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (
              <div key={job.id} className="job-card">
                <div className="job-header">
                  <div>
                    <h3>{job.company}</h3>
                    <p>{job.role}</p>
                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}
                </div>
                <button className="apply-btn" onClick={() => navigate(`/student/applications`)}>

              </div>

          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="empty-state">
            <p>No internships found</p>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default BrowseInternshipsPage;

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

### **13. `src/services/api.js`**

```js
import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use(
  (response) => response,
  (error) => {
    if (error.response?.status === 401) {
      localStorage.removeItem('authToken');
      localStorage.removeItem('user');
      window.location.href = '/login';
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

export default api;
```

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {

  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (

                  </div>
                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

### **13. `src/services/api.js`**

```js
import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use(
  (response) => response,
  (error) => {
    if (error.response?.status === 401) {
      localStorage.removeItem('authToken');
      localStorage.removeItem('user');
      window.location.href = '/login';
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

export default api;
```

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (

                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>

                <div className="skills">

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

### **13. `src/services/api.js`**

```js
import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use(
  (response) => response,
  (error) => {
    if (error.response?.status === 401) {
      localStorage.removeItem('authToken');
      localStorage.removeItem('user');
      window.location.href = '/login';
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

export default api;
```

              </button>
            </div>
          )}
        </section>

    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default DashboardPage;

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },

  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(

                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>

                <div className="skills">

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;
```

### **13. `src/services/api.js`**

```js
import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use(
  (response) => response,
  (error) => {
    if (error.response?.status === 401) {
      localStorage.removeItem('authToken');
      localStorage.removeItem('user');
      window.location.href = '/login';
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

export default api;
```

              </button>
            </div>
          )}
        </section>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default DashboardPage;

const BrowseInternshipsPage = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
  const [saved, setSaved] = useState([]);

  const internships = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend Dev', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹50K/mo', skills: ['React', 'JS'], deadline: '2026-03-15' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend Dev', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹48K/mo', skills: ['Python', 'Node'], deadline: '2026-03-20' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data Science', location: 'Remote', stipend: 'â‚¹55K/mo', skills: ['ML', 'Python'], deadline: '2026-03-10' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Amazon', role: 'DevOps', location: 'Bangalore', stipend: 'â‚¹52K/mo', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker'], deadline: '2026-03-25' },
  ];

  const filtered = internships.filter(
    i => i.company.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
         i.role.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
  );

  return (

            className="search-input"
          />
        </div>

        {filtered.length > 0 ? (
          <div className="internships-grid">
            {filtered.map(job => (

                  <button
                    className={`save-btn ${saved.includes(job.id) ? 'saved' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => toggleSave(job.id)}
                  >
                    {saved.includes(job.id) ? 'â¤ï¸' : 'ğŸ¤'}
                  </button>
                </div>
                <div className="job-meta">
                  <span>ğŸ“ {job.location}</span>
                  <span>ğŸ’° {job.stipend}</span>
                  <span>â±ï¸ Deadline: {job.deadline}</span>
                </div>
                <div className="skills">
                  {job.skills.map(s => <span key={s} className="skill">{s}</span>)}

};

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout';
import './MyApplications.css';

const MyApplicationsPage = () => {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all');

  const applications = [
    { id: 1, company: 'Google', role: 'Frontend', date: '2026-01-15', status: 'under-review' },
    { id: 2, company: 'Microsoft', role: 'Backend', date: '2026-01-20', status: 'interview-scheduled' },
    { id: 3, company: 'Amazon', role: 'Cloud', date: '2026-01-10', status: 'rejected' },
    { id: 4, company: 'Meta', role: 'Data', date: '2026-01-25', status: 'pending' },
    { id: 5, company: 'Apple', role: 'iOS', date: '2026-01-05', status: 'accepted' },
  ];

  const filtered = activeTab === 'all' ? applications : applications.filter(a => a.status === activeTab);

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'all', label: 'All', count: applications.length },
    { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').length },
    { id: 'under-review', label: 'Under Review', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'under-review').length },
    { id: 'interview-scheduled', label: 'Interview', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'interview-scheduled').length },
    { id: 'accepted', label: 'Accepted', count: applications.filter(a => a.status === 'accepted').length },
  ];

  return (
    <DashboardLayout userRole="student">
      <div className="applications-page">
        <h1>My Applications</h1>
        
        <div className="tabs">
          {tabs.map(tab => (
            <button
              key={tab.id}
              className={`tab ${activeTab === tab.id ? 'active' : ''}`}
              onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
            >
              {tab.label} <span className="count">{tab.count}</span>
            </button>
          ))}
        </div>

        <div className="applications-list">
          {filtered.map(app => (
            <div key={app.id} className={`app-item status-${app.status}`}>
              <div className="app-details">
                <h3>{app.company}</h3>
                <p>{app.role}</p>
                <small>Applied: {app.date}</small>
              </div>
              <div className={`status-badge ${app.status}`}>
                {app.status.replace('-', ' ')}
              </div>
            </div>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </DashboardLayout>
  );
};

export default MyApplicationsPage;

### **13. `src/services/api.js`**

```js
import axios from 'axios';

const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_BASE_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(
  (config) => {
    const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken');
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
    return config;
  },
  (error) => {
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

// Response interceptor
api.interceptors.response.use(
  (response) => response,
  (error) => {
    if (error.response?.status === 401) {
      localStorage.removeItem('authToken');
      localStorage.removeItem('user');
      window.location.href = '/login';
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);

export default api;
```

};

  getProfile: () => api.get('/users/profile'),
  updateProfile: (data) => api.put('/users/profile', data),
  uploadResume: (file) => {
    const formData = new FormData();
    formData.append('resume', file);
    return api.post('/users/resume', formData, {
      headers: { 'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data' },
    });
  },
  getResume: () => api.get('/users/resume'),
  changePassword: (oldPassword, newPassword) =>
    api.post('/users/change-password', { oldPassword, newPassword }),
};

export default userService;
